name: Dress the Spunch & Pat! (PROTOTYPE)
description:
The best of both worlds! Now you can dress the SpunchBop (SpongeBob) and Paytik (Patrick) on Itch.io! Both of my dress-up Scratch games, "Dress the Spunch!" and "Dress the Pat!" together for the first time, with some exclusive features! You can also now play in Widescreen, with 60 FPS! (They are not widescreen and are in 30FPS on Scratch)

(By the way, for now if you want to switch modes, you will need to reload the page. I will change that soon, sorry for my goofy ahh-ness. Hope you like the game even without that important feature.)

(Please note: The game is in it's Prototype stage, so things can change suddenly, or the game could be scrapped completely.)

See the original versions of Dress the Spunch! and Dress the Pat! on my Scratch account (Nickelodeon4Live).
